messages.subject: Dawn in Tucson here
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all: For those of you that have seen my name before I m back!!!!.  We just had Zak and Max in an unschooling school for the past 8 months and hubby and I
messages.messageBody:
Hi all:

For those of you that have seen my name before I'm back!!!!. We
just had Zak and Max in an unschooling school for the past 8 months
and hubby and I decided that paying $1300 a month for the kids to do
what they've been doing at home didn't really make sense. We are in
the process of moving from Tucson to the Denver/Boulder area of
Colorado in September and so decided it was time to get back on this
list.

Will post more later.... Glad to be back to an environment that I
have found interesting, informative, friendly, thought provoking and
challenging any of my old assumptions.

Off to watch the kids clean out the guinea pigs. Watching is what I
do a lot of now, rather than trying to tell them what to do or how
to do it!!!

Namaste

Dawn
